typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['country']) ~> StagingBlobCountry
source(output(
		maersk_regionid as string,
		maersk_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['region/*.parquet']) ~> regiondatafromblob
StagingBlobCountry derive(short = trim(toString(byName('short'))),
		country = trim(toString(byName('country'))),
		area = trim(toString(byName('area'))),
		team = trim(toString(byName('team'))),
		team_name = trim(toString(byName('team_name'))),
		regional_manager_dry = trim(toString(byName('regional_manager_dry'))),
		regional_manager_reefer = trim(toString(byName('regional_manager_reefer'))),
		sales_manager_dry = trim(toString(byName('sales_manager_dry'))),
		sales_manager_reefer = trim(toString(byName('sales_manager_reefer'))),
		customer_service = trim(toString(byName('customer_service'))),
		sales_operations = trim(toString(byName('sales_operations'))),
		sales_manager_backup = trim(toString(byName('sales_manager_backup'))),
		allowed_for_sale = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('allowed_for_sale'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		currency = trim(toString(byName('currency'))),
		nationalisation = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('nationalisation'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		tax_and_legal_approval = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('tax_and_legal_approval'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		custom_clearance = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('custom_clearance'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		custom_documentation_required_before_or_after_releasing_equipment = toInteger(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('custom_documentation_required_before_or_after_releasing_equipment'))))=='NONE',"379430000",
case(upper(trim(toString(byName('custom_documentation_required_before_or_after_releasing_equipment'))))=="BEFORE","379430001",
case(upper(trim(toString(byName('custom_documentation_required_before_or_after_releasing_equipment'))))=="AFTER","379430002")))),
		bilateral_sales = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('bilateral_sales'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		bilateral_gst_vat = toDecimal(trim(toString(byName('bilateral_gst_vat')))),
		local_vat_gst_amount = toDecimal(trim(toString(byName('local_vat_gst_amount')))),
		local_agency_billing = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('local_agency_billing'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		agency_sales_agreement = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('agency_sales_agreement'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		release_free_time = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('release_free_time')))),
		cash_payment_waiting_time = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('cash_payment_waiting_time')))),
		discount_limit_dry = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('discount_limit_dry')))),
		discount_limit_reefer = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('discount_limit_reefer')))),
		sales_terms = trim(toString(byName('sales_terms'))),
		sales_notice = trim(toString(byName('sales_notice'))),
		loc = trim(toString(byName('loc'))),
		cancellation_fee_per_unit = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('cancellation_fee_per_unit')))),
		handling_charges_per_unit = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('handling_charges_per_unit')))),
		load_port_to_display = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('load_port_to_display'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		discharge_port_to_display = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('discharge_port_to_display'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		invoice_header_general = trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_general'))),
		invoice_header_billoflading = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_billoflading'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		invoice_header_manufacturedby = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_manufacturedby'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		invoice_header_incoterm = trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_incoterm'))),
		invoice_header_getflevy = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_getflevy')))),
		invoice_header_nhilevy = toInteger(trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_nhilevy')))),
		invoice_header_portofloading = toBoolean(case(upper(trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_portofloading'))))=='Y',"1","0")),
		invoice_header_hfm = trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_hfm'))),
		invoice_header_hfmics = trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_hfmics'))),
		invoice_header_hfmpayer = trim(toString(byName('invoice_header_hfmpayer'))),
		invoice_address_abn_gst_taxid = trim(toString(byName('invoice_address_abn_gst_taxid'))),
		banking_details = trim(toString(byName('banking_details'))),
		scv_code_agency = trim(toString(byName('scv_code_agency')))) ~> DataTransformation
SelectRequiredColumns, regiondatafromblob lookup(maersk_region == regiondatafromblob@maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRegion
LookupRegion select(mapColumn(
		maersk_areacode,
		maersk_name = SelectRequiredColumns@maersk_name,
		maersk_region = maersk_regionid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRegion
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		maersk_areacode = area,
		maersk_name = area,
		maersk_region = team_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRegion aggregate(groupBy(maersk_areacode),
	each(match(name!='maersk_areacode'), $$ = first($$))) ~> SelectDistinctValues
SelectDistinctValues sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		maersk_areacode,
		maersk_name,
		maersk_region
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobArea

source(output(
		loc_cd as string,
		site_type as string,
		loc_dsc as string,
		country_cd as string,
		country_dsc as string,
		city_cd as string,
		city_dsc as string,
		cluster_cd as string,
		cluster_dsc as string,
		region_cd as string,
		region_dsc as string,
		pool_cd as string,
		pool_dsc as string,
		lopsc_cd as string,
		lopsc_dsc as string,
		lat as double,
		lon as double,
		email_address as string,
		phone as string,
		contact_person as string,
		address_1 as string,
		address_2 as string,
		address_3 as string,
		postal_code as string,
		city_name as string,
		local_tax as decimal(38,18),
		global_tax as decimal(38,18),
		eu_tax as decimal(38,18),
		state_province_name as string,
		sales_manager_dry as string,
		sales_manager_reefer as string,
		customer_service as string,
		sales_operations as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sitecsp/*.parquet']) ~> StagingBlobCountry
StagingBlobCountry derive(cluster_cd = trim(toString(byName('cluster_cd'))),
		cluster_dsc = trim(toString(byName('cluster_dsc')))) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		maersk_clustercode = cluster_cd,
		maersk_name = cluster_dsc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns aggregate(groupBy(maersk_name),
	each(match(name!='maersk_name'), $$ = first($$))) ~> SelectDistinctValues
SelectDistinctValues sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		maersk_clustercode,
		maersk_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobCluster

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['delivery_sites']) ~> StagingBlobCountry
source(output(
		loc_cd as string,
		site_type as string,
		loc_dsc as string,
		country_cd as string,
		country_dsc as string,
		city_cd as string,
		city_dsc as string,
		cluster_cd as string,
		cluster_dsc as string,
		region_cd as string,
		region_dsc as string,
		pool_cd as string,
		pool_dsc as string,
		lopsc_cd as string,
		lopsc_dsc as string,
		lat as double,
		lon as double,
		email_address as string,
		phone as string,
		contact_person as string,
		address_1 as string,
		address_2 as string,
		address_3 as string,
		postal_code as string,
		city_name as string,
		local_tax as decimal(38,18),
		global_tax as decimal(38,18),
		eu_tax as decimal(38,18),
		state_province_name as string,
		sales_manager_dry as string,
		sales_manager_reefer as string,
		customer_service as string,
		sales_operations as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sitecsp']) ~> sitedata
source(output(
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_poolid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['pool/*.parquet']) ~> pooldata
StagingBlobCountry derive(cluster_cd = trim(toString(byName('cluster_cd'))),
		cluster_dsc = trim(toString(byName('cluster_dsc')))) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		maersk_name = cluster_dsc,
		maersk_clustercode = cluster_cd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns aggregate(groupBy(maersk_name),
	each(match(name!='maersk_name'), $$ = first($$))) ~> SelectDistinctValues
SelectDistinctValues sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		maersk_name,
		maersk_clustercode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobCluster

source(output(
		loc_cd as string,
		site_type as string,
		loc_dsc as string,
		country_cd as string,
		country_dsc as string,
		city_cd as string,
		city_dsc as string,
		cluster_cd as string,
		cluster_dsc as string,
		region_cd as string,
		region_dsc as string,
		pool_cd as string,
		pool_dsc as string,
		lopsc_cd as string,
		lopsc_dsc as string,
		lat as double,
		lon as double,
		email_address as string,
		phone as string,
		contact_person as string,
		address_1 as string,
		address_2 as string,
		address_3 as string,
		postal_code as string,
		city_name as string,
		local_tax as decimal(38,18),
		global_tax as decimal(38,18),
		eu_tax as decimal(38,18),
		state_province_name as string,
		sales_manager_dry as string,
		sales_manager_reefer as string,
		customer_service as string,
		sales_operations as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['sitecsp/*.parquet']) ~> StagingBlobSite
source(output(
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_countrycode as string,
		maersk_countryid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['country/country.parquet']) ~> CountryBlob
StagingBlobSite derive(pool_cd = trim(toString(byName('pool_cd'))),
		pool_dsc = trim(toString(byName('pool_dsc'))),
		country_dsc = trim(toString(byName('country_dsc')))) ~> DataTransformation
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		maersk_poolcode = pool_cd,
		maersk_name = pool_dsc,
		maersk_country = country_dsc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectCountry aggregate(groupBy(maersk_name),
	each(match(name!='maersk_name'), $$ = first($$))) ~> SelectDistinctValues
CountryBlob derive(maersk_name = upper(trim(toString(byName('maersk_name'))))) ~> maersknametoUpper
SelectRequiredColumns, CountryBlob lookup(maersk_country == CountryBlob@maersk_name,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		maersk_poolcode,
		maersk_name = SelectRequiredColumns@maersk_name,
		maersk_country = maersk_countryid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCountry
SelectDistinctValues sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		maersk_name,
		maersk_poolcode,
		maersk_country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobPool
